db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type is used to specify visual properties that affect the whole graph. There are several built-in themes that can be used directly, or be modified freely. User can also create a theme from scratch using Theme3D.ThemeUserDefined.
For a more complete description, see Q3DTheme.

db:section.db:programlisting: Surface3D { ... theme: Theme3D { ambientLightStrength: 0.5 backgroundColor: "red" backgroundEnabled: true baseColor: "blue" colorStyle: Theme3D.ColorStyleUniform font.family: "Lucida Handwriting" font.pointSize: 35 gridEnabled: false gridLineColor: "black" highlightLightStrength: 0.5 labelBackgroundColor: "black" labelBackgroundEnabled: true labelBorderEnabled: false labelTextColor: "white" lightColor: "yellow" lightStrength: 0.4 multiHighlightColor: "green" singleHighlightColor: "darkRed" windowColor: "white" } ... }
db:section.db:para: For Theme3D enums, see Q3DTheme::ColorStyle and Q3DTheme::Theme.

db:section.db:title: ambientLightStrength : real
db:section.db:para: Ambient light strength for the whole graph. Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

db:section.db:title: backgroundColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the graph background.

db:section.db:title: backgroundEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Set background enabled or disabled.

db:section.db:title: baseColors : list<ThemeColor>
db:section.db:para: List of base colors to be used for all the objects in the graph, series by series. If there are more series than colors, color list wraps and starts again with the first color in the list. Has no immediate effect if colorStyle is not Theme3D.ColorStyleUniform.

db:section.db:title: baseGradients : list<ColorGradient>
db:section.db:para: List of base gradients to be used for all the objects in the graph, series by series. If there are more series than gradients, gradient list wraps and starts again with the first gradient in the list Has no immediate effect if colorStyle is Theme3D.ColorStyleUniform.

db:section.db:title: colorStyle : Theme3D.ColorStyle
db:section.db:para: The style of the graph colors. One of Theme3D.ColorStyle.

db:section.db:title: font : font
db:section.db:para: Set font to be used for labels.

db:section.db:title: gridEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Set grid lines enabled or disabled.

db:section.db:title: gridLineColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the grid lines.

db:section.db:title: highlightLightStrength : real
db:section.db:para: Specular light strength for highlighted objects. Value must be between 0.0 and 10.0.

db:section.db:title: labelBackgroundColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the label backgrounds. Has no effect if labelBackgroundEnabled is false.

db:section.db:title: labelBackgroundEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Set label backgrounds enabled or disabled.

db:section.db:title: labelBorderEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Set label borders enabled or disabled. Has no effect if labelBackgroundEnabled is false.

db:section.db:title: labelTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the font used for labels.

db:section.db:title: lightColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the specular light defined in Scene3D.

db:section.db:title: lightStrength : real
db:section.db:para: Specular light strength for the whole graph. Value must be between 0.0 and 10.0.

db:section.db:title: multiHighlightColor : color
db:section.db:para: Highlight color for highlighted objects. Used if selectionMode has AbstractGraph3D.SelectionRow or AbstractGraph3D.SelectionColumn flag set.

db:section.db:title: multiHighlightGradient : ColorGradient
db:section.db:para: Highlight gradient for highlighted objects. Used if selectionMode has AbstractGraph3D.SelectionRow or AbstractGraph3D.SelectionColumn flag set.

db:section.db:title: singleHighlightColor : color
db:section.db:para: Highlight color for a highlighted object. Used if selectionMode has AbstractGraph3D.SelectionItem flag set.

db:section.db:title: singleHighlightGradient : ColorGradient
db:section.db:para: Highlight gradient for a highlighted object. Used if selectionMode has AbstractGraph3D.SelectionItem flag set.

db:section.db:title: type : Theme3D.Theme
db:section.db:para: The type of the theme. If no type is set, the type is Theme3D.ThemeUserDefined. Changing the theme type after the item has been constructed will change all other properties of the theme to what the predefined theme specifies. Changing the theme type of the active theme of the graph will also reset all attached series to use the new theme.

db:section.db:title: windowColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the application window.
